In_Short: Entry bans and strict border controls.
Description: Germany has decided on entry bans and strict controls at the borders to Switzerland, France, Austria, Denmark, Luxembourg.

In_Short: Quarantine Bavaria, only vital locations open.
Description: Only vital location, like supermarkets, doctors stay open. Not more than two people are allowed to stay together in public (except those that live together. Families etc.).

In_Short: Quarantine country-wide, only vital locations open.
Description: Only vital location, like supermarkets, doctors stay open. Not more than two people are allowed to stay together in public (except those that live together. Families etc.).
